doc.title: 15th Annual Los Angeles Music Awards
doc.plot: This is the first time in the 15 year history of the LA Music Awards that this show has been filmed for Television release. Past winners have been the Black Eyed Peas, No Doubt, Sugar Ray and many, many others. This show awards the indie labels, performers and the artists who play in some of the biggest bands like former winners, Slash from Guns N Roses.
